SELECT * FROM mov_region;

SELECT * FROM mov_cinema
WHERE region_no = #{regionNo};

SELECT * FROM mov_movie_schedule
WHERE cinema_no = #{cinemaNo};

SELECT * FROM mov_movie
WHERE movie_no = #{movieNo};
SELECT * FROM mov_seat;
SELECT ms.seat_no, ms.seat_name FROM mov_seat ms JOIN mov_reservation mr ON ms.seat_no = mr.seat_no WHERE mr.schedule_no= #{scheduleNo};
SELECT ms.seat_no, ms.seat_name FROM mov_seat ms JOIN mov_screen_and_seat msas ON ms.seat_no = msas.seat_no WHERE screen_code= #{screenCode};
SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM vw_movie_manage_data;

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY member_no ORDER BY schedule_no desc) AS rownum, vw.* FROM vw_res_group_data vw) vw2
WHERE vw2.member_no= #{memberNo} AND vw2.rownum BETWEEN ${start} and ${end};

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY movie_no ORDER BY create_date desc) AS rownum, vw.* FROM vw_rew_data vw) vw2
WHERE vw2.movie_no= #{movieNo} AND vw2.rownum BETWEEN ${start} and ${end};

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY movie_no asc) AS rownum, vw.* FROM vw_movie_manage_data vw) vw2
WHERE vw2.rownum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end};
